title: Factorial and divisorss
text: You have given number of test cases.Each test case have two space separated integer L and R. You have to find total value of fun(L) + fun(L+1) + ... + fun(R), where fun(x) is total number of positive divisors of x factorial. Since result may be large print it modulo 1000000007.InputFirst line of input contains T total number of test case.Next T lines contain two space-separated integers L and R.1 ≤ T ≤ 10000001 ≤ L ≤ R ≤ 1000000OutputFor each test case output the result modulo 1000000007.ExampleInput:101 96 72 47 81 310 103 56 71 106 6Output:37790141567270289064730
